title: WTT EPDG Bresnahan Bat (SGC 50) for a Cycle 350 HOFer
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: WTT EPDG Bresnahan Bat (SGC 50) for a Cycle 350 HOFer
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I would like to trade one of my extra EPDG backs for a Cycle 350 HOFer.  I have a SGC 50 Bresnahan Bat and would like to trade it for a HOFer with a Cycle.  Looks like I sold my Cycles and kept all my EPDG cards!

Most put a little better money on the Cycle so I would trade my 50 for a nice 40 or 3.  I am open to most players, so let me know what you have.  I have a couple bucks if you have something you would like me to chip in a couple dollars on.  This card is freshly graded with a nice clean holder.

Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
